AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Abdullah Yusuf: Defendant involved in a human smuggling case near Laredo, Texas, convicted of trafficking aliens, who waived his Miranda rights and was hauling a load
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Andrew S. Oldham: Circuit Judge presiding over the appeal of Abdullah Yusuf's case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Juan Carlos De Arcos: Homeland Security Inspector who testified about the lot on Auburn Road
